mapper.insert: insert into shopping_notice (notice_idx, notice_title, notice_content, notice_date) values(shopping_notice_seq.nextval, #{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from shopping_notice order by notice_idx desc
mapper.update: update shopping_notice set notice_title=#{param2}, notice_content=#{param3}, notice_date= sysdate where notice_idx=#{param1}
